thread.title: Comment on WATCH: ISIS Beheads ‘Wizard’ With Giant Sword by Anonymous
thread.title_full: Comment on WATCH: ISIS Beheads ‘Wizard’ With Giant Sword by Anonymous

author: Anonymous
title: Comment on WATCH: ISIS Beheads ‘Wizard’ With Giant Sword by Anonymous
text:
WATCH: ISIS Beheads ‘Wizard’ With Giant Sword Published Updated 11:11 am EST, June 15, 2016 8 Comments By S.J. Prince 13.9k Share Tweet Follow 
In a new video purportedly released by the Islamic State titled “And Allah Will Complete the Revelation of His Light,” ISIS shows footage of dead enemy fighters before beheading a “sorcerer” in “Wilayat Salahuddin,” Iraq. The video was released on June 8 and the title comes from an interpretation of Quranic verse 61:8, which reads: 
They want to extinguish the light of Allah with their mouths, but Allah will perfect His light, although the disbelievers dislike it.
